thread.title: Study Psychiatric Drugs Linked to Violent Crime
thread.title_full: Study Psychiatric Drugs Linked to Violent Crime

title: Study Psychiatric Drugs Linked to Violent Crime
text:
Study: Psychiatric Drugs Linked to Violent Crime 
New American Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Mass killings lead the headlines much more than they used to. Schools, theaters, churches, and other places where people gather peacefully have become killing fields more and more frequently over the past few years. The gun control crowd -- never to miss an opportunity -- claims that guns are the problem. More guns means more mass killings. Less guns would mean fewer killings. It's simple, they say. There are a couple of problems with that "simple" theory, though. For one thing, some of these recent attacks have not involved guns. In those cases, the tools of death were knives, cars, bats, ...
